data.comment: The match is underway at Stade Louis II.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Monaco's Aleksandr Golovin misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 5, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Boulaye Dia.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Reims.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 13, In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Francois Letexier awards Reims a goal kick.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Reims just outside Monaco's area.
In the minute 15, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Reims have a goal kick.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 19, Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! El Bilal Toure extends Reims's lead to 0-2.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Reims.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In Fontvieille, Henry Onyekuru (Monaco) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 30, Monaco drives forward and Gelson Martins gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Louis II.
Francois Letexier awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Reims have a goal kick.
In Fontvieille Monaco attack through Aleksandr Golovin. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 37, Reims to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
In the minute 39, Monaco are on the attack at Stade Louis II, where Wissam Ben Yedder is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Reims have a goal kick.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 41, Dereck Kutesa for Reims has been booked by Francois Letexier and receives a first yellow card.
Francois Letexier awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 45, Monaco are pushing forward but Aurelien Tchouameni's finish is wide of the goal.
Francois Letexier awards Reims a goal kick.
At Stade Louis II the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 1-2. Axel Disasi got above everyone else to nod it in.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Aurelien Tchouameni.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Sofiane Diop is replacing Henry Onyekuru for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Monaco's Sofiane Diop gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Francois Letexier signals a Reims throw-in in Monaco's half.
Corner awarded to Reims.
Wout Faes (Reims) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
El Bilal Toure of Reims smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 53, Aurelien Tchouameni of Monaco gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Louis II.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 55, Goal! Benoit Badiashile levels the match at 2-2.
Aleksandr Golovin instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valon Berisha is replacing Dereck Kutesa for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Reims defence as Sofiane Diop fires in a strike for Monaco.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Mathieu Cafaro with Kaj Sierhuis.
In the minute 61, In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Reims make their third substitution with Arber Zeneli replacing El Bilal Toure.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Monaco.
In the minute 64, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco are pushing forward but Benoit Badiashile's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Reims have a goal kick.
Free kick Reims.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 69, Reims drive upfield and Arber Zeneli gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Monaco defender.
Throw-in Monaco.
In Fontvieille Monaco attack through Aleksandr Golovin. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 76, Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Monaco.
At Stade Louis II, Wout Faes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Monaco.
Francois Letexier awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 79, David Guion is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Louis II with Moreto Cassama replacing Boulaye Dia.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 81, Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a second substitution, with Willem Geubbels replacing Gelson Martins.
Free kick Reims.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Reims.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 85, Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Reims's area.
Francois Letexier awards the home team a throw-in.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Aleksandr Golovin with Jean-Eudes Aholou. This is the third substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Fontvieille.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Axel Disasi (Monaco) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Louis II.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Axel Disasi (Monaco) gets a yellow card.
Reims's Thomas Foket has been booked in Fontvieille.
